trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functionality of an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: 설치 된 음성 합성 엔진이의 기능에 대 한 액세스를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new SpeechSynthesizer object, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: 새 SpeechSynthesizer 개체를 만들 때 기본 시스템 음성을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To configure the SpeechSynthesizer to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 설치 된 음성 합성 (텍스트 음성 변환) 하는 음성 중 하나를 사용 하도록 SpeechSynthesizer를 구성 하려면 사용 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 설치 된 음성에 대 한 정보를 얻으려면 사용 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>메서드와 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>클래스</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class also provides control over the following aspects of speech synthesis: - To configure the output for the SpeechSynthesizer object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 또한이 클래스는 음성 합성의 다음 양상에 대 한 제어 제공:-SpeechSynthesizer 개체에 대 한 출력을 구성을 사용 하려면는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To generate speech, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -음성을 생성 하려면 사용 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can produce speech from text, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, or from [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer 음성 텍스트에서 생성할 수는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>개체 또는 [음성 합성 Markup Language (SSML) 버전 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: - To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -일시 중지 하 고 음성 합성을 다시 시작 하려면 사용 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To add or remove lexicons, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -를 추가 하거나 제거할 사전을를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer can use one or more lexicons to guide its pronunciation of words.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer 단어의 해당 발음 안내 하나 이상의 사전을 사용 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: - To modify the delivery of speech output, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -수정 하려면 배달 음성 출력의를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Volume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Rate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechSynthesizer raises events when it encounters certain features in prompts: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesizer 표시 되는 메시지의 특정 기능에 도달할 때 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.: (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>, 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: It also raises events that report on the start (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) and end (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>) of speak operations and on the change of the speaking voice (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).
trans-unit.target: 시작 부분에 대해 보고 하는 이벤트 발생 (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>) 및 종료 (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>)의 작업 들이 사용 및 음성의 변경이 (<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the SpeechSynthesizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 항상 호출 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>는 SpeechSynthesizer에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the SpeechSynthesizer object's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 가비지 수집기 SpeechSynthesizer 개체를 호출할 때까지 사용 중인 리소스를 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않으면 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: 초기화할 새 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>인스턴스를 사용 하 여 기본 시스템 음성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to use one of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 구성 하는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>중 하나를 사용 하는 설치 된 음성 합성 (텍스트 음성 변환) 음성을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 설치 된 음성에 대 한 정보를 얻으려면 사용 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>메서드와 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>클래스</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a lexicon to the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 어휘 집 추가 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A pronunciation lexicon is a collection of words or phrases together with their pronunciations, which consist of letters and characters from a supported phonetic alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 발음 lexicon은 단어 또는 구의는 지원 되는 phonetic 알파벳 문자와으로 구성 된 해당 발음 함께 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use a lexicon to specify custom pronunciations for specialized vocabulary in your application.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에서 특정된 어휘에 대 한 사용자 지정 발음을 지정 하는 용어를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in an external lexicon file take precedence over the pronunciations of the speech synthesizer's internal lexicon or dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 외부 사전 파일에 지정 된 발음 음성 신시사이저 내부 어휘 집 또는 사전의 발음 보다 우선 합니다.

trans-unit.source: However, pronunciations specified inline in prompts created with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> methods take precedence over pronunciations specified in any lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 발음에에서 지정 된 인라인 프롬프트 중 하나를 사용 하 여 만든는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A>메서드 모든 어휘 집에 지정 된 발음 보다 우선 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendSsmlMarkup%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inline pronunciations apply only to a single occurrence of a word.
trans-unit.target: 인라인 발음 단어의 개별 항목에만 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [집 및 Phonetic 알파벳](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) 자세한 정보에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can add multiple lexicons to a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object.Two values are currently supported for the `mediaType` parameter: - The value `application/pls+xml` indicates that the lexicon conforms to the [Pronunciation Lexicon Specification (PLS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).
trans-unit.target: 여러 집을 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>개체에 추가할 수 있습니다. 두 값에 현재 지원 되는 `mediaType` 매개 변수:-값 `application/pls+xml` 어휘 집에 맞는지 나타냅니다는 [발음 어휘 집 사양 (PLS) 버전 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201766).</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred format to use.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하도록 기본 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: - The value `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` indicates that the lexicon format is Uncompressed Lexicon, which is a Microsoft-proprietary format.
trans-unit.target: -값 `application/vdn.ms-sapi-lex` 어휘 집 형식의 Microsoft 전용 형식인 압축 되지 않은 어휘 집 임을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This is a legacy format and we recommend that you use the PLS format described above.
trans-unit.target: 레거시 형식 이며 이른바 PLS 형식을 사용 하는 것이 좋습니다.

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon information.
trans-unit.target: 어휘 집 정보의 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The media type of the lexicon.
trans-unit.target: 어휘 집의 미디어 유형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Media type values are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 미디어 형식 값은 대/소문자 구분 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 발생 시기는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 프롬프트에서 책갈피에서 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>중 하나를 처리 하는 동안이 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트와 연결 된 데이터에 대 한 내용은 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: You can add bookmarks using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 책갈피를 추가할 수는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: 삭제는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 세션 중 사용 되는 개체 및 버전 리소스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Acts as a safeguard to clean up resources in the event that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*> method is not called.
trans-unit.target: 리소스를 정리 하는 보호 기능이 역할에 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>메서드가 호출 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prompt that the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> is speaking.
trans-unit.target: 메시지를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 말하기 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the prompt object that is currently being spoken.
trans-unit.target: 현재 사용 중인 되는 프롬프트 개체를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices.
trans-unit.target: 모든 설치 된 음성 합성 (텍스트 음성 변환) 음성 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A voice is an engine for speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) that is installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 음성은 시스템에 설치 된 음성 합성 (텍스트 음성 변환 또는 TTS)에 대 한 엔진.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: 현재 시스템에 설치 된 음성의 읽기 전용 컬렉션을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the installed speech synthesis (text-to-speech) voices that support a specific locale.
trans-unit.target: 모든 설치 된 음성 특정 로캘을 지원 (텍스트 음성 변환) 합성 음성 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If none of the installed voices support the specified locale, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 설치 된 음성 지원을 지정 된 로캘 none 인 경우이 메서드는 빈 컬렉션을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows와 System.Speech API는 모든 유효한 언어 국가 코드를 받습니다.

trans-unit.source: To perform text-to-speech using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech synthesis engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Culture 속성에 지정 된 언어를 사용 하 여 텍스트 음성 변환을 수행 하려면 해당 언어 국가 코드를 지 원하는 음성 합성 엔진이 설치 되어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The speech synthesis engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes: - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows 7 작업은 다음과 같은 언어 국가 코드와 함께 제공 된 음성 합성 엔진:-EN-US입니다.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: 영어 (미국)-ZH-CN 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: 중국어 (중국)-zh-tw로 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: 중국어 (대만) 두 문자 언어 코드 "en"와 같은 허용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The locale that the voice must support.
trans-unit.target: 음성 지원 해야 하는 로캘.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the voices currently installed on the system that support the specified locale.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 로캘을 지원 시스템에 현재 설치 된 음성의 읽기 전용 컬렉션을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Pauses the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a phoneme is reached.
trans-unit.target: 음소에 도달할 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A phoneme is a basic component of written language, typically a letter of an alphabet (or the combination of two letters) that represents one or more distinct sounds.
trans-unit.target: 음소는 작성 된 언어의 기본적인 구성 요소, 일반적으로 하나 이상의 고유 소리를 나타내는 문자는 영문자 (또는 두 글자의 조합)입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the letter “c” is a phoneme that may sound like “s” in “cinder”, or like “k” in “catch”.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, "c" 문자 "콘크리트"의 "s" 또는 "catch"에 "k" 처럼 보일 수도 있는 음소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A written word is an assemblage of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: 서 면된 단어는 음소 동작이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Changing a phoneme in a word will alter its spelling.
trans-unit.target: 음소를 단어의 변경 사전을 변경 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance generates a PhonemeReached event for each portion of a word that constitutes a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>인스턴스는 음소를 구성 하는 단어의 각 부분에 대 한 PhonemeReached 이벤트를 생성 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, for the word “theme” would generate three PhonemeReached events; one for the “th” sound, one for the “e” sound, and one for the “m” sound (me).
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 단어 "테마"은 이벤트를 생성 세 PhonemeReached; "th" 소리, "e" 소리 및 하나 (me) "m" 사운드에 대 한 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 예 및 이벤트와 연결 된 데이터에 대 한 정보에서 참조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 말하기 속도 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the speaking rate of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object, from -10 through 10.
trans-unit.target: 읽기 속도의 반환는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> -10-10에서 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Removes a lexicon from the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 사전에서 제거 된 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> for an example.
trans-unit.target: 참조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>예제를 보려면.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location of the lexicon document.
trans-unit.target: 어휘 집 문서 위치를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Resumes the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: 이력서는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체 후 일시 중지 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Selects a specific voice by name.
trans-unit.target: 이름으로 특정 음성을 선택합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>메서드 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>클래스의 이름을 가져오는를 선택할 수 있는 텍스트 음성 변환 (TTS) 음성이 설치.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice, pass the entire contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A> property as the argument for the SelectVoice method.
trans-unit.target: 음성 선택, 전달의 전체 내용을 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>SelectVoice 메서드에 대 한 인수로 속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice that contains `name` in the voice's <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>개체를 포함 하는 첫 번째 설치 된 음성 선택 `name` 음성의 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> performs a case-sensitive, substring comparison to determine if the voice matches the `name`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>음성 일치 하는지 확인 하는 대/소문자 구분, 부분 문자열 비교를 수행는 `name`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, 메서드 각각 레지스트리에서 찾은 음성의 최소 특정 조건에 맞는지 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 유효성 검사를 실패 하는 모든 음성에 대 한 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>설정 해당 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성을 `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에서 음성을 선택할 수 없습니다 인 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성은 `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 응용 프로그램 음성의 설정 하지 것입니다 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by gender, age, or locale, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 성별, 연령, 또는 로캘 음성을 선택 하려면 중 하나를 사용는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: 음성 선택의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender.
trans-unit.target: 특정 성별 음성을 선택합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>메서드 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>클래스의 이름을 가져오는를 선택할 수 있는 텍스트 음성 변환 (TTS) 음성이 설치.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> property matches the `gender` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>개체를 첫 번째 설치 된 음성 선택 인 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>속성이 일치는 `gender` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, 메서드 각각 레지스트리에서 찾은 음성의 최소 특정 조건에 맞는지 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 유효성 검사를 실패 하는 모든 음성에 대 한 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>설정 해당 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성을 `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에서 음성을 선택할 수 없습니다 인 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성은 `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 응용 프로그램 음성의 설정 하지 것입니다 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 다른 특성에 따라 음성을 선택 하려면 다른 참조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 음성을 이름으로 선택 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: The gender of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: 선택 음성의 성별입니다.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender and age.
trans-unit.target: 특정 성별 및 연령으로 음성을 선택합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>메서드 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>클래스의 이름을 가져오는를 선택할 수 있는 텍스트 음성 변환 (TTS) 음성이 설치.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object selects the first installed voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>개체를 첫 번째 설치 된 음성 선택 인 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>속성 일치는 `gender` 및 `age` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, 메서드 각각 레지스트리에서 찾은 음성의 최소 특정 조건에 맞는지 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 유효성 검사를 실패 하는 모든 음성에 대 한 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>설정 해당 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성을 `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에서 음성을 선택할 수 없습니다 인 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성은 `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 응용 프로그램 음성의 설정 하지 것입니다 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice based on other characteristics, see the other <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 다른 특성에 따라 음성을 선택 하려면 다른 참조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a voice by name, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 음성을 이름으로 선택 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>

trans-unit.source: The gender of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: 선택 음성의 성별입니다.

trans-unit.source: The age of the voice to select.
trans-unit.target: 선택 음성의 연령입니다.

trans-unit.source: Selects a voice with a specific gender and age, based on the position in which the voices are ordered.
trans-unit.target: 음성의 정렬 된 위치에 따라 특정 성별 및 연령에 있는 음성을 선택 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class to obtain the names of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>메서드 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>클래스의 이름을 가져오는를 선택할 수 있는 텍스트 음성 변환 (TTS) 음성이 설치.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds installed voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> properties match the `gender` and `age` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>설치 찾습니다 voices 갖는 개체 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>속성 일치는 `gender` 및 `age` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>일치 항목을 찾아 반환 음성 때 참조 횟수가 계산 된 `voiceAlternate` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: When an application calls <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>, 메서드 각각 레지스트리에서 찾은 음성의 최소 특정 조건에 맞는지 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: For any voice that fails verification, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> sets its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 유효성 검사를 실패 하는 모든 음성에 대 한 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>설정 해당 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성을 `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application cannot select a voice whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property is `False`.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에서 음성을 선택할 수 없습니다 인 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성은 `False`.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications will not set a voice’s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 응용 프로그램 음성의 설정 하지 것입니다 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object finds voices whose <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A> properties match the `gender`, `age`, and `culture` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>찾습니다 voices 갖는 개체 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A>속성 일치는 `gender`, `age`, 및 `culture` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> counts the matches it finds, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the asynchronous speaking of a prompt with the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancel%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsyncCancelAll%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous synthesis operation for a queued prompt.
trans-unit.target: 큐에 대기 중인된 프롬프트에 대 한 비동기 합성 작업을 취소합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to cancel an asynchronous speak operation for the following: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 취소 하려면이 메서드를 사용할 수도 있습니다는 다음에 대 한 작업 들이 사용:-내용의 <xref:System.String>에 지정 된 한 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: -의 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>에 지정 된 한 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>

trans-unit.source: - The contents of a <xref:System.String> containing SSML specified by a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -의 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.String>로 지정 된 SSML을 포함 하는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech creates a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object and populates it with the contents of the method's parameter, and returns the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> object.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>, System.Speech 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>개체 메서드의 매개 변수가의 내용으로 정보를 표시 하 고 반환 된 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>개체입니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you retain a copy of the returned <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>, you can pass it into SpeakAsyncCancel to cancel speaking content specified in a <xref:System.String> or a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 복사본을 보관 하는 경우 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>에 지정 된 읽기 콘텐츠를 취소 하려면 SpeakAsyncCancel에 전달할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.String>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>개체입니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt>

trans-unit.source: The content for which to cancel a speak operation.
trans-unit.target: 읽기 작업을 취소 하려는 콘텐츠입니다.

trans-unit.source: Cancels all queued, asynchronous, speech synthesis operations.
trans-unit.target: 큐에 대기 중인 모든, 비동기, 음성 합성 작업을 취소합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> completes the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 발생 시기는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 프롬프트 말하기 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the SpeakCompleted event at the completion of any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>중 아무 메서드나 완료 시 SpeakCompleted 이벤트가 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>클래스 속성이 없는 및 SpeakCompleted 이벤트에서 데이터를 반환 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 작성자 SpeakCompleted 이벤트에 대 한 이벤트 처리기를 작성할 수 있도록 제공 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Raised after the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> speaks each individual word of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 후에 발생는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 각 개별 단어는 프롬프트를 대상으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event for each new word that it speaks in a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>프롬프트를 사용 하 여 대상 하는 새로운 각 단어에 대해이 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 예 및 이벤트와 연결 된 데이터에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously speaks a <xref:System.String> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 동기적으로 대상으로 한 <xref:System.String>SSML 태그를 포함 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter must include a `speak` element and must conform to the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763).
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠는 `textToSpeak` 매개 변수를 포함 해야 합니다는 `speak` 요소 따라야 합니다는 [음성 합성 Markup Language (SSML) 버전 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [음성 합성 태그 언어 참조](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To asynchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: SSML 태그를 포함 하는 문자열에 비동기적으로 발표를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> to initiate the synchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>동기 말하기 SSML 태그를 포함 하지 않는 문자열의 시작 하려면.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하는 동안는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>다음 이벤트를 발생 시킬 수 있습니다.- <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 신시사이저의 말하는 상태가 변경 될 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: 신시사이저 음성 생성이 시작 될 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: 문자 또는 음성 언어로 신중한 소리를 구성 하는 문자 조합이 신시사이저에 도달할 때마다를 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: 단어를 말할 신시사이저 완료 될 때마다 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: 음성된 출력에서 입 또는 음성을 생성 하는 데 사용 안 면 업무를 줄이고의 위치 변경 해야 할 때마다를 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 신시사이저 프롬프트에서 책갈피를 발견할 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 음성 신시사이저에 대 한 변경 될 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> event while processing the SpeakSsml method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>발생 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>SpeakSsml 메서드를 처리 하는 동안 이벤트.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The SSML string to speak.

trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠는 `textToSpeak` 매개 변수를 포함 해야 합니다는 `speak` 요소 따라야 합니다는 [음성 합성 Markup Language (SSML) 버전 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [음성 합성 태그 언어 참조](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94)합니다.

trans-unit.source: To synchronously speak a string that contains SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 으로 동기적으로 언급 해야 할 SSML 태그를 포함 하는 문자열을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> to initiate the asynchronous speaking of a string that does not contain SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>SSML 태그를 포함 하지 않는 문자열의 비동기 대화를 시작 하려면.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하는 동안는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>다음 이벤트를 발생 시킬 수 있습니다.- <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking state of the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 신시사이저의 말하는 상태가 변경 될 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer begins generating speech.
trans-unit.target: 신시사이저 음성 생성이 시작 될 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer reaches a letter or combination of letters that constitute a discreet sound of speech in a language.
trans-unit.target: 문자 또는 음성 언어로 신중한 소리를 구성 하는 문자 조합이 신시사이저에 도달할 때마다를 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakProgress>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time the synthesizer completes speaking a word.
trans-unit.target: 단어를 말할 신시사이저 완료 될 때마다 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VisemeReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised each time spoken output requires a change in the position of the mouth or the facial muscles used to produce speech.
trans-unit.target: 음성된 출력에서 입 또는 음성을 생성 하는 데 사용 안 면 업무를 줄이고의 위치 변경 해야 할 때마다를 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer encounters a bookmark in a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 신시사이저 프롬프트에서 책갈피를 발견할 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the speaking voice for the synthesizer changes.
trans-unit.target: 음성 신시사이저에 대 한 변경 될 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the synthesizer finishes processing a SpeakSsmlAsync operation.
trans-unit.target: 신시사이저 SpeakSsmlAsync 작업 처리를 완료할 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If your application dos not need to perform tasks while speaking, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> method to generate speech synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 dos가 필요 없는 말하는 동안 작업을 수행 하는 경우 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>음성을 동기적으로 생성 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SMML markup to speak.
trans-unit.target: 으로 언급 해야 할 SMML 태그입니다.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously speaks a <xref:System.String> that contains SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: 비동기적으로 대상으로 한 <xref:System.String>SSML 태그를 포함 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> begins the speaking of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: 발생 시기는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 프롬프트 대화를 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when it begins processing a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>처리를 사용 하 여 프롬프트를 시작 하면이 이벤트가 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>클래스 속성이 없는 및 SpeakStarted 이벤트에서 데이터를 반환 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the SpeakStarted event.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 작성자 SpeakStarted 이벤트에 대 한 이벤트 처리기를 작성할 수 있도록 제공 됩니다.

trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 말하기 가져옵니다의 상태는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: To get the new state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> after it changes, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>그 다음 변경 내용을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>클래스</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs> 의 속성</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> 의 새 상태를 가져오려면

trans-unit.source: Returns the current speaking state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 말하는 상태를 반환 하는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 시기의 상태는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises this event when its speaking <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>이 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다 때 해당 말하기 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A>변경.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For an example and more information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 예 및 이벤트와 연결 된 데이터에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To pause and resume speech synthesis, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지 되 고 음성 합성을 다시 시작을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Resume%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Pause%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a viseme is reached.
trans-unit.target: viseme에 도달할 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A viseme is the basic position of the mouth and face when pronouncing a phoneme.
trans-unit.target: viseme는는 음소 발음 입 및 글꼴의 기본 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: Visemes are visual representations of phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Visemes 음소의 시각적 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports 21 visemes for US English, each of which corresponds to one or more phonemes.
trans-unit.target: System.Speech 영어 (미국), 하나 이상의 음소에 해당 하는 각각 visemes 21을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: VisemeReached events are raised when a new phoneme reached has a different corresponding viseme than the previous phoneme reached.
trans-unit.target: VisemeReached 이벤트에 도달 하면 새 음소에 도달 하면 이전 음소 보다 다른 해당 viseme에 있을 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Since some visemes represent more than one phoneme, a VisemeReached event is not generated if the next phoneme reached corresponds to the same viseme as the previous phoneme.
trans-unit.target: 일부 visemes 둘 이상의 음소 나타내므로 VisemeReached 이벤트에 도달 하면 다음 음소 이전 음소도 동일한 viseme에 해당 하는 경우 생성 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, for the spoken words “this zone”, a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached> event is raised for the “s” in “this” and the “z” in “zone”.
trans-unit.target: 음성을 "이 영역이"에 대 한 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>"this"의 "s" 및 "영역"에 "z"에 대 한 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.PhonemeReached>

trans-unit.source: However, a VisemeReached event is not raised for the “z” in “zone” because it corresponds to the same viseme as the “s” in “this”.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 동일한 viseme로 "this"의 "s"에 해당 하므로 VisemeReached 이벤트가 "영역"에 "z"에 대 한 발생 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of the 21 SAPI phonemes and phoneme groups that correspond to a viseme in US English.
trans-unit.target: 다음은 21 SAPI 음소 및 영어 (미국) viseme에 해당 하는 음소 그룹의 목록입니다.

trans-unit.source: |Viseme|Phoneme(s)| |------------|------------------| |0|silence| |1|ae, ax, ah| |2|aa| |3|ao| |4|ey, eh, uh| |5|er| |6|y, iy, ih, ix| |7|w, uw| |8|ow| |9|aw| |10|oy| |11|ay| |12|h| |13|r| |14|l| |15|s, z| |16|sh, ch, jh, zh| |17|th, dh| |18|f, v| |19|d, t, n| |20|k, g, ng| |21|p, b, m| For information about data associated with the `VisemeReached` event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: | Viseme | Phoneme(s) | |------------|------------------| |&0; | 대기 | |&1; | ae ax, 아 | |&2; | aa | |&3; | ao | |&4; | 입력란, eh, 어 | |&5; | 어 | |&6; | y "," iy "," 면 "," ix | |&7; | w, uw | |&8; | ow | |&9; | aw | |&10; | oy | |&11; | ay | |&12; | h | |&13; | r | |&14; | l | |&15; | z, s | |&16; | sh, 채널, jh, 글꼴 | |&17; | th, dh | |&18; | f, v | |&19; | d, t, n | |&20; | k, g, ng | |&21; | p, b, m | 와 연결 된 데이터에 대 한 내용은 `VisemeReached` 이벤트 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs> 를 참조 하세요.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 음성에 대 한 정보를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When you initialize a new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, it uses the default system voice.
trans-unit.target: 초기화할 새 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, 기본 시스템 음성을 사용 하 여.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To configure the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object to use one of the installed speech synthesis voices, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 구성 하는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>를 하는 설치 된 음성 합성 음성 중 하나를 사용 하도록 개체는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 설치 된 음성에 대 한 정보를 얻으려면 사용 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>메서드와 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>클래스</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the current voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 음성에 대 한 정보를 반환 된 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the voice of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 발생 시기의 음성은 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For an example and information about data associated with the event, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 예 및 이벤트와 연결 된 데이터에 대 한 정보에서 참조 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 음성 변경할 수 있습니다 하는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>함께 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>의 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>메서드 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>의 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the output volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 출력 볼륨을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the volume of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref>, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: 부피를 반환 된 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref>, 0에서 100 까지입니다.
